title: Social Media Manager Job at Loopify
content:
Loopify is a smart engagement platform helping brands build meaningful relationships with customers through automated, data-driven solutions. We’re simplifying customer journeys and driving business growth, one loop at a time. Business owners are often swamped with numerous responsibilities, making it challenging to dedicate time and focus to ad campaigns. Our expert-assisted model, blending human expertise with advanced AI, offers a strategic solution. By entrusting your advertising to our dedicated network of professionals, you leverage their deep knowledge and precision for maximum ad budget efficiency. This partnership allows you to focus on running your business while we ensure your ads achieve their fullest potential
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

What You’ll Do


	Manage and grow our presence on LinkedIn, X (Twitter), IG, TikTok & co.
	Create/curate compelling content, graphics, copy, videos.
	Stay on trend, monitor performance, and evolve strategy.
	Engage community, respond to DMs/comments, and build vibes.
	Collaborate with the marketing squad on campaigns and product drops.
	Develop social media strategy
	Provide data analysis and metric reporting for clients


You Fit If You


	Experience, at least you have ran and handled social media platforms for a brand for 2–4 years.
	Vast copywriting skills and very creative.
	Understand what metrics matter (engagement, reach, clicks, etc).
	Can switch tone and style depending on platform.
	Bonus: You’ve built brand voice or scaled a following from scratch.

title: HR Outsourcing Manager Job at ICL Support Services Limited
content:
ICL Support Services Limited (Rc:679920) is an organization established with the primary objective of providing fast, efficient, reliable and cost-effective corporate support service solutions to a wide range of clients. Primary amongst these classes of services is Recruitment, Outsourcing and Personnel Support Services to our corporate clients. The company also provides telecommunications support services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR Outsourcing Manager

Job Location: Anthony, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking an experienced Outsourcing Manager to lead our outsourcing initiatives and drive business growth.
	As an Outsourcing Manager, you'll be responsible for developing and implementing outsourcing strategies, managing vendor relationships, and ensuring high-quality service delivery.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Development: Develop and implement outsourcing strategies to drive business growth and improve efficiency.
	Vendor Management: Manage vendor relationships, negotiate contracts, and ensure compliance with service level agreements.
	Performance Monitoring: Monitor and report on outsourcing performance, identifying areas for improvement.
	Risk Management: Identify and mitigate risks associated with outsourcing, ensuring business continuity.
	Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with internal stakeholders to ensure outsourcing initiatives meet business needs.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Management, or related field.
	Experience: Proven experience in outsourcing management, preferably in a similar industry.


Skills:


	Strong strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
	Ability to manage complex projects and vendor relationships.
	Strong analytical and reporting skills.


What We Offer


	Competitive Salary: A competitive salary package, commensurate with experience.
	Benefits: A range of benefits, including health insurance, retirement plan, and paid leave.
	Career Development: Opportunities for career growth and professional development.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Resume and Cover Letter to: recruitments@iclgroupng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
